attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i think that we must make better use of our roads and road sharing is one way forward
the meaning of road sharing is that we allocate certain times for heavy goode vehicles to be on our roads as a suggetion i propose that all hgv,s be off the roads between the hours of 7.30 am till 9.30 am ..and between 4.30pm till 6.30pm ..there is also a case for all of our hgv,s to deliver through the night proposed hours of delivery would be 11pm till 06.30 hours.
this would save the goverment millions of pounds and also save our green belt.

mick
